question.text: With respect to blood groups, the person having ______ blood group is definitely heterozygous.

solution.text: ABO blood group system is controlled by 3 different alleles <math><msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></mrow></msup></math>, <math><msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></mrow></msup></math> and i. A person with blood group A may have genotypes <math><msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></mrow></msup><msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></mrow></msup></math> or <math><msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></mrow></msup><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></math> . The person with blood group B may have genotypes <math><msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></mrow></msup><msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></mrow></msup></math> or <math><msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></mrow></msup><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi></math> . The person with blood group O has genotype ii. Person with blood group AB has genotype <math><msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></mrow></msup><msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">B,</mi></mrow></msup></math> so the person is definitely heterozygous.
